thread.title: ANC’s ‘Premier League’ could face a backlash
thread.title_full: ANC’s ‘Premier League’ could face a backlash | News24

author: news24.com
title: ANC’s ‘Premier League’ could face a backlash
text:
Fresh from two spectacular victories in which they engineered the election of the ANC Women’s League and ANC Youth League (ANCYL) presidents, the informal group known as the Premier League could face a backlash ahead of the party’s national general council (NGC) next month.
The group’s preferred candidate, the little-known North West MEC of local government and human settlements, Collen Maine, was elected unopposed as league president on Friday night.
The big push for him to get elected came from the three premiers who are part of the Premier League: David Mabuza of Mpumalanga, North West’s Supra Mahumapelo and the Free State’s Ace Magashule.
The three also chair the ANC in their provinces.
